title: Delta Variant Concerns as Kids Head Back-to-School
itunes:title: Delta Variant Concerns as Kids Head Back-to-School
description:
Dr. Elizabeth Meade, Medical Director of Pediatric Quality & Safety at Swedish Health Services discusses vaccinating minors and concerns about the delta variant as kids head back to school. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Healthcare Reporter Riley Griffin on vaccine mandates for kids is the next big back-to-school fight. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Autos Analyst Kevin Tynan on GM earnings and impact of chip shortage on company. Bloomberg News Wealth Reporter Anders Melin on Elon Musk’s outrageous moonshot award catches on across America. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, CIO at Hightower RDM Financial Group.


Hosted by Tim Stenovec and Paul Sweeney Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
